
//#include <stack>
//#include <conio.h>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
int main ()
{
    int T,t,i,N,jokes,j,sum,d,x;
    cin>>T;
	for(i=0;i<T;i++)
	{
        sum = 0;
		cin>>N>>d;
		for(j=1;j<=N;j++)
		{
			cin>>t;
			sum = sum + t;
        }
        x = ((N-1)*10) + sum;
		if(x < d)
        {
                      //if((x-d)%5 == 0) 
                      jokes = ((N-1)*2)+((d-x)/5);
                                 
                      //else 
                      //jokes = -1;
        
        }
        else 
        jokes = -1;
        cout<<jokes<<"\n";
        //cout<<"N"<<N<<"d"<<d<<"sum"<<sum<<"x"<<x;
        jokes = 0;
        x =0;
       
        
	
		
	}
//getch();
return 0;
}
